page.title: Commands
page.p: The cmd element may be used to mark the entire command, including all arguments. Mallard does not contain elements to mark the arguments specifically, as there is rarely a need to distinguish them typographically. The var element may be used inside a cmd element to indicate text that should be replaced by the user.

section.title: Basic Use
section.code: To start Totem Movie Player, enter totem at the command line.
section.p: To start Totem Movie Player, enter totem at the command line.

section.title: Using var
section.code: To view a file in Totem Movie Player, enter totem file at the command line, replacing file with the name of the file.
